TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayModeCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartDisplayModeCollection Inherits CollectionBase
public ref class WebPartDisplayModeCollection sealed : System::Collections::CollectionBase

span.span: Contains a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类旨在包含对象的集合 。The class is designed to contain a collection of objects. 它主要由 控件用于管理对象的集合 。It is used primarily by the control to manage collections of objects. 显示模式是在指定为属性上的当前显示模式时显示的网页的特殊视图 。A display mode is a special view of a Web page that appears when it is assigned as the current display mode on the property. 显示模式用于在 Web 部件控件集中创建页面视图，用户可在其中执行特殊任务，如编辑控件或重新排列页面布局。Display modes are used in the Web Parts control set to create page views in which users can carry out special tasks, such as editing controls, or rearranging the layout of a page. 控件定义了几种显示模式，包括、、、 和 。The control defines several display modes, including , , , , and . 显示模式的集合由 属性引用。The collection of display modes is referenced by the property. 在使用 Web 部件控件的任何特定网页上，只有某些显示模式可用。On any particular Web page that uses Web Parts controls, only certain display modes are available. 默认浏览模式和设计模式几乎始终可用，但其他显示模式只有在页面上存在其相应区域类型时才可用。The default browse mode and the design mode are nearly always available, but the other display modes are available only if their corresponding zone types are present on the page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 控件使用其属性跟踪页面上的可用显示模式 。The control keeps track of the available display modes on a page with its property. 此属性引用 包含所有受支持的显示模式的对象。This property references a object that contains all the supported display modes. 类没有公开的构造函数，因此无法创建自己的新实例。The class does not have an exposed constructor, so you cannot create your own new instance of it. 如果创建自定义 对象，并希望它成为控件中受支持的显示模式的集合的一部分 ，则必须从 类继承，重写 方法，调用基方法以创建集合，然后使用其方法向集合添加任何自定义显示模式 。If you create a custom object and want it to be part of the collection of supported display modes in the control, you must inherit from the class, override the method, call the base method to create the collection, and then add any custom display modes to the collection by using its method. 类具有两个公共属性。The class has two public properties. 属性是一个只读属性，指示集合是否为只读。The property is a read-only property that indicates whether the collection is read-only. 重载 属性提供对集合成员的访问。The overloaded property provides access to the members of the collection. 类还具有若干方法。The class also has several methods. 已提到的方法使您能够将对象添加 到集合中。The method, already mentioned, enables you to add objects to the collection. 方法确定集合中是否存在特定的显示模式。The method determines whether a particular display mode exists in the collection. 方法将集合复制到对象的数组。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 方法返回集合中特定显示模式的索引。The method returns the index of a particular display mode within the collection. 最后，使用 方法可以在集合中的特定索引处插入显示模式对象。Finally, the method enables you to insert a display mode object at a particular index in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates working with the class. 关键在于，必须从 类继承并重写 方法，以将自定义 对象添加到 控件创建的集合中 。The key point is that you must inherit from the class and override the method to add a custom object to the collection created by the control. 此代码示例包含五个部分：This code example has five parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载其他控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 驻留在网页的某个区域中的用户控件 ，可用于在标签中输入和显示文本。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 包含两个控件的源代码文件。A source code file that contains two controls. 一个是自定义 控件; 另一个是 要添加到页的默认显示模式的自定义对象。One is a custom control; the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 此示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works. 代码示例的第一部分（允许您更改显示模式的用户控件）的源代码来自另一主题。The source code for the first part of the code example, the user control that lets you change display modes, comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含两个 控件：用户控件和自定义 控件。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 请注意 `Register` 页面顶部的指令，以引用已编译控件的用户控件和命名空间。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是用户控件，用于输入和显示文本。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 请注意，它使用 控件来创建用户界面 (UI) 的多个视图。Notice that it uses a control to create multiple views of the user interface (UI). 一个视图与按钮一起显示，另一个视图没有。One view is displayed with the button, the other without. 请注意，在重写的 `OnPreRender` 方法中，代码会检查页面当前是否处于自定义显示模式，如果是，它将显示 "用户" 控件的第一个视图，其中包含按钮。Notice that the in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode, and if so, it displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果页面不在自定义显示模式下 (例如，如果页面处于浏览或设计模式) ，则隐藏按钮。If the page is not in the custom display mode (for example, if the page is in browse or design mode), the button is hidden. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 该示例的第四部分是两个自定义类的源文件。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 请注意，自定义 类将重写 方法，调用基方法以添加所有默认的显示模式，然后添加自定义显示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自定义的显示模式类 `InLineEditDisplayMode` 只是从继承 ，它在构造函数中设置显示模式的名称，并覆盖一些基属性以建立自定义显示的特征。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要运行此代码示例，请在浏览器中加载此页。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 请注意，页面目前处于浏览模式，并且没有按钮可见。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件，将页面更改为 **内联编辑显示** 模式，请注意，现在按钮在较低用户控件中可见。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the button is visible in the lower user control. 添加一些文本，然后单击按钮以更新控件。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 请注意，页面显示将返回到浏览模式，此时将显示您输入的文本，并再次隐藏按钮，因为页面不在自定义显示模式中。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is not in the custom display mode.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Public Function Add (value As WebPartDisplayMode) As Integer

span.span: A to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数值，指示 插入到集合中的位置。

span.span: An integer value that indicates where the was inserted into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 方法将新 对象添加到现有 对象。You can use the method to add new objects to an existing object. 例如，在创建自定义 类时，需要将其添加到页上受支持的显示模式的集合中时，就会出现这种情况。An example of a scenario in which you would do this is when you create a custom class, and you want to add it to the collection of supported display modes on a page. 为此，必须从 类继承并重写其 方法，首先调用基方法，然后使用 方法将自定义显示模式添加到集合中。To do that, you must inherit from the class and override its method, first calling the base method, and then using the method to add the custom display mode to the collection. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用 类。This code example demonstrates the use of the class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码和说明，请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 以下代码部分发生在 用于重写方法的派生类中 ，并将自定义显示模式添加到集合中。The following section of code occurs in a derived class that overrides the method and adds a custom display mode to the collection. [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以检查特定 对象并确定该对象是否在 对象中。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望创建自定义数组以编程方式操作一组对象，则此方法很有用 。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有多个 对象，并且您需要知道 (一个对象相对于其他对象的索引) 序号位置，则此方法非常有用。The method is useful if you have multiple objects, and you need to know the ordinal position (the index) of one object relative to the others.

param.name: index
param.span: 一个整数，指示集合中应插入 的序号位置。

span.span: An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a should be inserted.
A to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 将 对象插入到集合中的指定索引位置处。

span.span: Inserts a object into the collection at the specified index position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 等于集合中的项数，则 `value` 将追加到集合的末尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean
public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.

value.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示集合是否为只读。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the collection is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值由 Web 部件控件集在内部更改，因为它在不同的点更改集合的内容。The property value is changed internally by the Web Parts control set as it changes the contents of the collection at different points. 例如，在控件将 所有受支持的显示模式添加到其 集合中后，它会将该对象内部设置 为只读，以防止其被更改。For example, after the control has added all supported display modes to its collection, it internally sets the object to read-only to prevent it from being changed. > [!NOTE] > 虽然您可以读取代码的值，但没有任何机制可从代码中更改此属性值。There is no mechanism to change this property value from your code, although you can read its value.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 根据索引或唯一标识符获取集合中的特定成员。

span.span: Gets a specific member of the collection according to its index or a unique identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使你可以 通过使用表示其在集合中的序号位置的索引号来访问集合中的对象。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够 通过使用特定显示模式的字符串标识符来访问集合中的对象。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular display mode.
